meta.description: Maximize the amount of foam produced by making cheap and expensive boxes under resource and heat constraints.

sets.name: BOX_TYPES
sets.description: Types of boxes produced by the store.

params.name: metal_usage
params.description: Units of metal used per box type.

params.name: acid_usage
params.description: Units of acid used per box type.

params.name: foam_production
params.description: Units of foam produced per box type.

params.name: heat_production
params.description: Units of heat produced per box type.

params.name: heat_limit
params.description: Maximum units of heat that can be given off.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of box to produce.

constraints.name: metal_constraint
constraints.description: Metal usage must not exceed available metal.

constraints.name: acid_constraint
constraints.description: Acid usage must not exceed available acid.

constraints.name: heat_constraint
constraints.description: Heat production must not exceed the limit.
